amendment.description: Page 13, line 6, insert "or" after the semicolon. Page 13, strike line 7 (and redesignate the subsequent paragraph accordingly). Page 13, line 9, strike "through (6)" and insert "through (5)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-378 to strike "produce timber" as a forest management activity designated for Categorical Exclusion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Schrader.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
